dublin_core.dcvalue: m pesaTM is a fast secure and convenient way to transact on mobile brought to you by Vodafone through its wholly owned subsidiary Vodafone m pesa Limited VMPL in association with ICICI Bank VMPL has been authorized by Reserve Bank of India RBI under Payment and Settlement Systems Act 2007 for Setting up and Operating a Payment System in India VMPL is also a business correspondent of ICICI Bank Note m pesa is a registered trademark of Vodafone and is now available across India
